RECORD.name: 1-Damage
RECORD.description: Applies HIT-1 to character.

RECORD.name: 10-Damage
RECORD.description: Applies HIT-10 to character.

RECORD.name: 20-Damage
RECORD.description: Applies HIT-20 to character.

RECORD.name: 5-Damage
RECORD.description: Applies HIT-5 to character.

RECORD.name: Automaton
RECORD.description: Character is of only this alliance; all others are suppressed.

RECORD.name: Criton
RECORD.description: Character is of only this alliance; all others are suppressed.

RECORD.name: Enemy
RECORD.description: Use this to mark a character hostile.

RECORD.name: Foreign
RECORD.description: Character is of only this alliance; all others are suppressed.

RECORD.name: Friend
RECORD.description: Use this to mark a character as a player character.

RECORD.name: Independent
RECORD.description: Use this to mark a character as a non-player, non-hostile character.

RECORD.name: Klaton
RECORD.description: Character is of only this alliance; all others are suppressed.

RECORD.name: No Score
RECORD.description: Place character with this card in the Discard Pile.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Discard this character. Do not score.

RECORD.name: Private
RECORD.description: Character is of only this alliance; all others are suppressed.

RECORD.name: Selected
RECORD.description: Use this to mark a character as selected.

RECORD.name: Skalle
RECORD.description: Character is of only this alliance; all others are suppressed.

RECORD.name: Target
RECORD.description: Use this to mark a character as a target.

RECORD.name: Terran
RECORD.description: Character is of only this alliance; all others are suppressed.

RECORD.name: Theed
RECORD.description: Character is of only this alliance; all others are suppressed.

RECORD.name: Timer
RECORD.description: Use for tracking card lifespans. Place a Timer card behind the card being tracked for each additional turn of existence. Remove a TImer card at the end of the turn.

RECORD.name: Abandon Ship
RECORD.description: Select a player ship. Only the selected ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription1: DD+ENG{GT}9 and DD+SCI{GT}9 of selected ship.

RECORD.name: Advance Scout
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Select 3 cards from the Discard Pile and shuffle them into the Tour Deck.

RECORD.name: Alien Judgement
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Discard the top 2 cards of Tour Deck.

RECORD.name: Archeology Dig
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Find a resource card in Tour Deck and place it in your hand.

RECORD.name: Autopilot
RECORD.description: Select a non-aligned system with {RSRC_SPACEPORT}. Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription3: Destroy all systems with {RSRC_SPACEPORT} and discard any visitors in them.

RECORD.name: Beserker
RECORD.description: Select an NPC with {RSRC_PLANET_KILLER}. Find and play if necessary. Any player ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: Brimstone
RECORD.description: Select a system that has {POP} and {RSRC_SYSTEM_ASTEROIDS}. Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Destroy selected system and discard all visitors.

RECORD.name: Build Facility
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Find and play on the system a resource card with {RSRC_INSTALLATION}. Mark with {RSRC_RELATIONSHIP_FRIEND}.

RECORD.name: Build Space Port
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Find {AMP} Play on the system a resource card with {RSRC_SPACEPORT}. Mark with {RSRC_RELATIONSHIP_FRIEND}.

RECORD.name: Cal Virus
RECORD.description: Select 3 aligned systems with {RSRC_TECHNOLOGY_MODERN} and mark with NO SCORE. Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription1: DD+SCI{GT}9 in each system to remove NO SCORE mark.

RECORD.name: Catastrophe
RECORD.description: Select a player ship. Discard the top 3 cards of the Tour Deck when played. Only the selected ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: Colonize System
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Play a resource card with {POP} on an unclaimed system.

RECORD.name: Covert Ops
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription1: 2DD+CMD{GT}15 in a non-aligned system that has {RSRC_TECHNOLOGY_MODERN} and {RSRC_MILITARY}.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Discard the top 3 cards of Tour Deck.

RECORD.name: Covert Salvage
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription1: CMD+DD{GT}9 and ENG+DD{GT}9 in a non-aligned system.

RECORD.name: Cracked Mirror
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription2: All non-aligned characters will target and attack a ship if possible.

RECORD.name: Criton Barrier
RECORD.description: Select a player ship. Only the selected ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Selected ship may not exit system.
RECORD.evtdescription3: Discard all resource cards in the Tour Deck.

RECORD.name: Dogs Of War
RECORD.description: Select 2 non-aligned systems with {POP} and {RSRC_TECHNOLOGY_MODERN}. Select a player ship. Only the selected ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Owner DIP{GT}DIP of other selected system.

RECORD.name: Emergency
RECORD.description: Select a player ship with {RSRC_CREW}. Only the selected ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Selected ship stays in system with {RSRC_MEDICAL}.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Discard from selected ship a resource card with {RSRC_CREW}.

RECORD.name: Evacuate
RECORD.description: Select a non-aligned system with {POP}. Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription3: Destroy selected system and discard all visitors.

RECORD.name: Find Him
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Score an NPC ship with {POP} without defeating it.

RECORD.name: Investigate Rift
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: Investigation
RECORD.description: Select a player ship. Only the selected ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: Mine Sweep
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: Mole
RECORD.description: Select a player ship. Only the selected ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription2: DD: 0-4. Discard a resource card with {RSRC_CARGO} or {RSRC_DATA} from selected ship.

RECORD.name: Negotiations
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription1: DD+DIP{GT}9 in a non-aligned system with {RSRC_COMMERCE}.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Find and place in your hand up to 2 resource cards..

RECORD.name: Observation
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription1: DD+SCI{GT}9 in a system that has {RSRC_TECHNOLOGY_PRIMITIVE}.

RECORD.name: On Travel
RECORD.description: Select a player ship for this mission. Only the selected ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Visit a different aligned systems with {POP}.
RECORD.evtdescription3: Visit a different aligned systems with {POP}.

RECORD.name: Overdrive
RECORD.description: Select a player ship. Only the selected ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription1: DD+SCI{GT}9 and DD+ENG{GT}9 of selected ship.
RECORD.evtdescription2: DD. 0: Discard selected ship. 1-7:Move selected ship to random system.

RECORD.name: Patrol Sector
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: Personnel Xfer
RECORD.description: Select a player ship. Only the selected ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Stay in a different system with {RSRC_SPACEPORT}.

RECORD.name: Prisoner Xfer
RECORD.description: Select a player ship. Only the selected ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Stay in a different system with {RSRC_SPACEPORT}.

RECORD.name: Relief Mission
RECORD.description: Select a system that has a {POP} and {RSRC_TECHNOLOGY_MODERN}. Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Play a resource card with {RSRC_MEDICAL} or {RSRC_FOOD} on selected system.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Discard 2 resource cards from your hand.

RECORD.name: Rescue Lifepod
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: Rescue The La'Tel
RECORD.description: Select a system with {RSRC_SYSTEM_BLACKHOLE}. Any player ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: SAR
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: Space Probe
RECORD.description: Select an NPC ship with {RSRC_POPULATION_ARTIFICIAL}. Find and play NPC if needed. Any player ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: Space Sickness
RECORD.description: Select a player ship. Only the selected ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Discard the top card of the Tour Deck.

RECORD.name: Split Seam
RECORD.description: Select a system with {RSRC_SYSTEM_SPACIAL_RIFT}. Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription1: DD+SCI{GT}9 and DD+ENG{GT}9 in selected system.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Destroy selected and both adjacent systems and discard any visitors.

RECORD.name: Strike Back
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: Strike Pirates
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: Study Blackhole
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: Study Nebulae
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: Study Wormhole
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: Temporal Wave
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Destroy a DD system and discard all visitors in it.

RECORD.name: Terraforming
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription1: DD+SCI{GT}9 and DD+ENG{GT}9 in system with {RSRC_SYSTEM_PLANET_N}.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Find and play a resource card with {RSRC_SYSTEM_PLANET_M} on system where completed.

RECORD.name: Terrorists
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Find {AMP} play a resource card with {RSRC_CREW}.

RECORD.name: The Anomaly
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Select a resource card from the Tour Deck.

RECORD.name: The Diplomat
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription1: DD+DIP{GT}9 in a non-aligned system with {POP}.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Mark the current system with FRIEND.

RECORD.name: The Encounter
RECORD.description: Select an NPC. Find and play NPC if necessary. Any player ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: The Plague
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription2: DD. 0-2: Plague goes out of control. Mission fails.

RECORD.name: The Roundup
RECORD.description: Find and play NPC with {RSRC_SPACE_CREATURE} if needed. Any player ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: Times Three
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: Times Two
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.

RECORD.name: War Games
RECORD.description: Select an aligned system. Select a player ship. Only the selected ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Stay in selected system for first consecutivte turn.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Stay in selected system for second consecutivte turn.

RECORD.name: Xantam Mining
RECORD.description: Any player ship may work this mission.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Find and place in your hand a resource card with {RSRC_CARGO}.

RECORD.name: Ambassador
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: Ambassador Trien
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: Battle Platform
RECORD.description: Play on a random, non-player system without {RSRC_SATELLITE}.

RECORD.name: Cargo
RECORD.description: Play on a random, non-player system with {POP}. and no {RSRC_CARGO}.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Transfer card to ship. Ship cannot have {RSRC_PIRATE}.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Transfer card to ship. Mark system with {RSRC_RELATIONSHIP_ENEMY}.

RECORD.name: Cargo II
RECORD.description: Play on a random, non-player system with {POP}. and no {RSRC_CARGO}.
RECORD.evtdescription1: DD. 3-9: Transfer card to ship. Ship cannot have {RSRC_PIRATE}.
RECORD.evtdescription2: DD. 6-9: Transfer card to ship. Mark system with {RSRC_RELATIONSHIP_ENEMY}.

RECORD.name: Cargo III
RECORD.description: Play on a random, non-player system with {POP}. and no {RSRC_CARGO}.
RECORD.evtdescription1: DD. 6-9: Transfer card to ship. Ship cannot have {RSRC_PIRATE}.
RECORD.evtdescription2: DD. 7-9: Transfer card to ship. Mark system with {RSRC_RELATIONSHIP_ENEMY}.

RECORD.name: Cargo IV
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship this is in a player system with {RSRC_MILITARY}.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Do DMG+15 to system and all visitors

RECORD.name: Cargo V
RECORD.description: Play on a random, non-player system with {POP}. and no {RSRC_CARGO}.
RECORD.evtdescription1: DD. 6-9: Transfer card to ship. Mark system with ENEMY.

RECORD.name: Chief Eng. Casey
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: Colony
RECORD.description: Play on an unclaimed system that has {RSRC_SYSTEM_PLANET_L}, {RSRC_SYSTEM_PLANET_M} , or {RSRC_SYSTEM_PLANET_N} in a player ship location.

RECORD.name: Comm Bouy
RECORD.description: Play on an unclaimed system that does not have {RSRC_SATELLITE} in a player ship location.

RECORD.name: Cooperation
RECORD.description: Play on a non-player system with {POP} and no {RSRC_RELATIONSHIP_ENEMY}, {RSRC_PIRATE} or {RSRC_GUARD} in a player ship location.

RECORD.name: Criton Bomb
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship while in a player system that has {RSRC_TECHNOLOGY_ADVANCED} or {RSRC_MILITARY} or {RSRC_NATURAL_ANOMALY}.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Do 70 DAMAGE to selected target in the same system. Mark target with {RSRC_RELATIONSHIP_ENEMY}. Score card.

RECORD.name: Defense Network
RECORD.description: Play on a player or unclaimed system that does not have {RSRC_SATELLITE}.

RECORD.name: Dr. Know
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: Dreadnought
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: Engineering Conf.
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: Extended Range
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: Findings
RECORD.description: Play on a non-player system with {RSRC_ARCHEOLOGY} and no {RSRC_DATA}.

RECORD.name: Findings II
RECORD.description: Play on a non-player system with {RSRC_RELIGION} and no {RSRC_DATA}.

RECORD.name: Fire Power
RECORD.description: Play on a player system with a {POP}

RECORD.name: Fire Power II
RECORD.description: Play on a {RSRC_RELATIONSHIP_ENEMY} system that has a {POP}

RECORD.name: Gateway
RECORD.description: Play on an unclaimed system that does not have {RSRC_GATEWAY}.
RECORD.evtdescription1: A ship with {RSRC_ALLIANCE_AUTOMATON} or {RSRC_NATURAL_ANOMALY} can move to/from a system with {RSRC_GATEWAY} from/to any system for a cost of 1 SPD.

RECORD.name: Gemstones
RECORD.description: Play on player ship that is in a system that has {RSRC_NATURAL_MINERAL}.

RECORD.name: Gemstones II
RECORD.description: Play on player ship that is in a system that has {RSRC_NATURAL_MINERAL}. DD. 5-9: Play card on player ship.

RECORD.name: Growing Pains
RECORD.description: Play on a random, non-player system with a {POP}.

RECORD.name: Hazard Beacon
RECORD.description: Play on a system with {RSRC_SYSTEM_HAZARD} with no {RSRC_SATELLITE} that has a player ship.

RECORD.name: Hostages
RECORD.description: Play on an non-player system with a {POP} that does not have {RSRC_PASSENGER}.
RECORD.evtdescription1: DD. 6-9: Play on ship. 0-1: Discard card.

RECORD.name: Juggernaut
RECORD.description: Play on a random, non-player ship.

RECORD.name: Legendary Captain
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: Mark IV Torpedo
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship that is in a system with {RSRC_MILITARY}.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Range of torpedo is 2 systems. DD. 4-9: Hit, DMG=10. Score card. Mark target as {RSRC_RELATIONSHIP_ENEMY} and its target is the ship that fired torpedo.

RECORD.name: Medical Staff
RECORD.description: Play on a random, non-player system with {POP} that does not have {RSRC_PASSENGER}.

RECORD.name: Medicinal Herbs
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship that is in a system that has {RSRC_NATURAL_ECOSPHERE} or {RSRC_MEDICAL}.

RECORD.name: Medicinal Herbs II
RECORD.description: Select a player ship in a system that has {RSRC_NATURAL_ECOSPHERE} or {RSRC_MEDICAL}. DD. 5-9: Play on selected ship.

RECORD.name: Military Data
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship in a non-player system that has {RSRC_TECHNOLOGY_MODERN}

RECORD.name: Military Data II
RECORD.description: Play on a random, non-player system with a {POP} and {RSRC_MILITARY} and no {RSRC_DATA}.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Mark system with ENEMY. DD. 6-9: Transfer card to ship.

RECORD.name: Mine Field
RECORD.description: Play on a random, non-player system with {POP} and without {RSRC_SPACE_MINES}.
RECORD.evtdescription1: DD for each visitor that does not have {RSRC_SPACE_MINES}. 5-9: Mark with 10 DAMAGE.
RECORD.evtdescription2: CMD+TAC+DD{GT}15 with ship with {RSRC_SPACE_MINES} in same location; discard card.

RECORD.name: Mine Layer
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Find {AMP} play a resource or card with {RSRC_SPACE_MINES}.

RECORD.name: New Crew
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: New Crew II
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: New World
RECORD.description: Play on a player or unclaimed system that has a star and a player ship.

RECORD.name: Next Level
RECORD.description: Play on a player system with {POP}.

RECORD.name: Outpost
RECORD.description: Play on an unaligned system with a player ship.

RECORD.name: Particle Cannon
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: Particle Cannon II
RECORD.description: Select a player ship in a system that has {RSRC_MILITARY}.DD. 4-9: Play card on selected ship.

RECORD.name: Prisoner
RECORD.description: Play on a non-aligned system that has {RSRC_SPACEPORT}.

RECORD.name: Rapid Fire
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: Relief Supplies
RECORD.description: Play on a system with {POP} and a player ship.

RECORD.name: Reprogramming
RECORD.description: Play on an non-player ship that has {RSRC_POPULATION_ARTIFICIAL} and a player ship. Remove from non-player ship any card with {RSRC_RELATIONSHIP_ENEMY}.

RECORD.name: Science Computer
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: Scientific Data
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship in a non-player system that has SCI{GT}3 that does not have {RSRC_DATA}.

RECORD.name: Security Force
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: Security Team
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: Service Station
RECORD.description: Play on a non-enemy system.

RECORD.name: Shield Upgrade
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: Shield Upgrade II
RECORD.description: Select a player ship in a system with {RSRC_MILITARY}. DD. 4-9: Play card on selected ship.

RECORD.name: Space Mines
RECORD.description: Play on a player or unclaimed system with player ship with {RSRC_SPACE_MINES}.
RECORD.evtdescription1: DD for each NPC visitor that does not have {RSRC_SPACE_MINES}. 5-9: Mark with 10 DAMAGE.

RECORD.name: Space Port
RECORD.description: Play on an player or unclaimed system.

RECORD.name: Spirit Wind
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship in a system with {RSRC_RELIGION}.

RECORD.name: Spirit Wind II
RECORD.description: Select a player ship in a system with {RSRC_RELIGION}. DD. 4-9: Play on selected ship.

RECORD.name: Stealth Mode
RECORD.description: Play during a combat round.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Owner may not use any {ACTION_BATTLE} or {SPECIAL_ACTION_BATTLE} this round . Opponent misses.

RECORD.name: Strange Find
RECORD.description: Play on a random system with no {RSRC_NATURAL_ANOMALY}.

RECORD.name: Strike It Rich
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship in a system with {RSRC_COMMERCE}.

RECORD.name: Strike It Rich II
RECORD.description: Select a palyer ship in a system that has {RSRC_COMMERCE}. DD. 4-9: Play on selected ship.

RECORD.name: Strike It Rich III
RECORD.description: Select a palyer ship in a system that has {RSRC_COMMERCE}. DD. 6-9: Play on selected ship.

RECORD.name: Supplies
RECORD.description: Play on a system with {POP} and player ship.

RECORD.name: Tac Satellite
RECORD.description: Play on an aligned or unclaimed system without {RSRC_SATELLITE} and with player ship.

RECORD.name: Tactical Training
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: Targeting
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: Targeting II
RECORD.description: Select a player ship in a player system with {RSRC_MILITARY}. DD. 5-9 : Play card on the selected ship.

RECORD.name: Trading Post
RECORD.description: Play on an independent or unclaimed system.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Trade 1 card in your hand for the top card in the Tour Deck. Player must have {RSRC_IMN}.

RECORD.name: Treaty
RECORD.description: Play on an independent system with player ship.

RECORD.name: Upgraded
RECORD.description: Play on a random, non-player ship that has {RSRC_TECHNOLOGY_MODERN}.

RECORD.name: Ambush
RECORD.description: Play during combat round while in a system that has {RSRC_SYSTEM_PLANET_O}, {RSRC_SYSTEM_PLANET_P}, {RSRC_SYSTEM_ASTEROIDS} or {RSRC_SYSTEM_NEBULAE}.

RECORD.name: Assist
RECORD.description: Play on Rulings.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Combine the CMD, DIP, SCI and ENG of all aligned characters within system.

RECORD.name: Attack Pattern
RECORD.description: Play during a combat round.

RECORD.name: Broken Spirit
RECORD.description: Play on a random player ship.

RECORD.name: Captain MacKay
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship. Player characters must not have {RSRC_PIRATE} or {RSRC_GUARD}.

RECORD.name: Captain Silver
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship. Player characters must not have {RSRC_IMN} or {RSRC_GUARD}.

RECORD.name: Captain Spencer
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship. Player characters must not have {RSRC_IMN} or {RSRC_PIRATE}.

RECORD.name: Challenge
RECORD.description: Play on a non-aligned ship. Mark a player ship or system with Target. This card overrides NPC guide.
RECORD.evtdescription1: NPC will move towards a location of selected player character.
RECORD.evtdescription2: NPC will attack selected player character if in same location.

RECORD.name: Cloaking Device
RECORD.description: Play during a combat round.

RECORD.name: Comm Failure
RECORD.description: Discard all mission cards in your hand except those with NOW.

RECORD.name: Complete Mission
RECORD.description: Score a mission in play.

RECORD.name: Difficult Mission
RECORD.description: Play a random mission from the Tour Deck if there are less than 3 missions in play.

RECORD.name: Disable Engines
RECORD.description: Play on an NPC ship during {PLAYER_PHASE} or {COMBAT_PHASE} phase in same location as a player character.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Owner may not exit current location.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Owner may not use any {SPECIAL_ACTION_BATTLE} weapons.

RECORD.name: Disable Opponent
RECORD.description: Play on an NPC ship during {PLAYER_PHASE} or {COMBAT_PHASE} phase in same location as a player character.

RECORD.name: Disable Weapons
RECORD.description: Play on an NPC ship during {PLAYER_PHASE} or {COMBAT_PHASE} phase in same location as a player character.

RECORD.name: Distress Signal
RECORD.description: Play on non-aligned ship or system that has {POP} and not {RSRC_RELATIONSHIP_ENEMY} or {RSRC_PIRATE}. Player cannot have {RSRC_PIRATE}.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Combine the CMD, DIP, SCI and ENG of any aligned characters in the same location.

RECORD.name: Double Punch
RECORD.description: Play during a combat round.

RECORD.name: Double Trouble
RECORD.description: Play during a combat round. Player character may be an aggressor a second time.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Character takes no penalty for previous engagements.

RECORD.name: Downgrade
RECORD.description: Play on a random, non-aligned ship that has {RSRC_TECHNOLOGY_MODERN} or {RSRC_TECHNOLOGY_ADVANCED}.

RECORD.name: Downgrade II
RECORD.description: Play on a random, non-aligned character that has {RSRC_TECHNOLOGY_MODERN} or {RSRC_TECHNOLOGY_ADVANCED}.

RECORD.name: Downgrade III
RECORD.description: Play on a random, non-aligned character that has {RSRC_TECHNOLOGY_MODERN} or {RSRC_TECHNOLOGY_ADVANCED}.

RECORD.name: Downtime
RECORD.description: Play a random player ship.

RECORD.name: Draw Two
RECORD.description: Draw 2 cards from top of the Tour Deck.

RECORD.name: Enemy Mine
RECORD.description: Play on a random player character.

RECORD.name: Engine Stall
RECORD.description: Play on a random player ship.

RECORD.name: Engine Trouble
RECORD.description: Play on a random player ship.

RECORD.name: Evasive
RECORD.description: Play during a combat round.

RECORD.name: Explosion
RECORD.description: Play on a random player ship.

RECORD.name: Extended Stay
RECORD.description: Play a Timer card on any card that has a lifetime.

RECORD.name: Fail Mission
RECORD.description: Fail a random mission in play.

RECORD.name: Filler
RECORD.description: This card does not affect the game when played.

RECORD.name: Fleeting Moments
RECORD.description: Discard the top 3 cards from Tour Deck.

RECORD.name: Forgotten Item
RECORD.description: Discard 2 resource cards with {RSRC_CARGO} attached to a player ship.

RECORD.name: Gateway Pass
RECORD.description: Play on Rulings.
RECORD.evtdescription1: A ship with {RSRC_ALLIANCE_AUTOMATON} or {RSRC_NATURAL_ANOMALY} can move to/from a system with {RSRC_GATEWAY} from/to any system for a cost of 1 SPD.

RECORD.name: Hard Times
RECORD.description: Play on Rulings.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Sobtract 2 from DD for aligned characters.

RECORD.name: Hesitation
RECORD.description: Play on a non-aligned character.

RECORD.name: Home Port
RECORD.description: Score any number of resource cards with {RSRC_CARGO} or {RSRC_PASSENGER} from a ship.

RECORD.name: Intervention
RECORD.description: Remove a mission card from play as though the it was never played and place it in the Discard Pile.

RECORD.name: Intervention II
RECORD.description: Remove a non-aligned ship from play as though the it was never played and place it in the Discard Pile.

RECORD.name: Intervention III
RECORD.description: Remove a ruling from play as though the it was never played and place it in the Discard Pile.

RECORD.name: Ion Storm
RECORD.description: Play on a random player ship.

RECORD.name: Ion Storm II
RECORD.description: Play on a random player ship.

RECORD.name: Klaton Treaty
RECORD.description: Play on Rulings.

RECORD.name: Lay Low
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: Lost Worlds
RECORD.description: Discard 3 random system cards from Tour Deck.

RECORD.name: Lucky Lady
RECORD.description: Add 2 to DD for player characters.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Add 2 to DD for aligned characters.

RECORD.name: Lure
RECORD.description: Play on a character in the same location as a player character.
RECORD.evtdescription1: All NPCs that do not have a target will target owner.

RECORD.name: Managereous
RECORD.description: Play on a random player ship.

RECORD.name: Miracle Repair
RECORD.description: Remove up to 10 DAMAGE from a character.

RECORD.name: Mix It Up
RECORD.description: Shuffle Tour Deck.

RECORD.name: Mobius Strip
RECORD.description: Shuffle Points Pile and return the top 2 cards to Tour Deck.

RECORD.name: Moving Day
RECORD.description: Move a player ship to a random system.

RECORD.name: Mutual Aid
RECORD.description: Play on a non-player character with {POP} and no {RSRC_RELATIONSHIP_ENEMY} in the same location as a player character.

RECORD.name: No Trespassing
RECORD.description: Play on a random, non-player system with {POP}.

RECORD.name: Plan B
RECORD.description: Play on a random player character in a location with a non-player character.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Owner may not use any {SPECIAL_ACTION_BATTLE} weapons.

RECORD.name: Play Dead
RECORD.description: Play during a combat round.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Opponenet TAC=0. Opponent may not fire any weapon.

RECORD.name: Posturing
RECORD.description: Play on a random player ship.

RECORD.name: Raid
RECORD.description: Search the Tour Deck or Discard Pile for 3 cards except ruling cards and place them in your hand. Mark system where a player ship is located with {RSRC_RELATIONSHIP_ENEMY}.

RECORD.name: Rebellion
RECORD.description: Play on a random, player system with {POP}.
RECORD.evtdescription1: CMD+TAC{GT}CMD+TAC of system: Discard this card.

RECORD.name: Return Again
RECORD.description: Take any 3 cards from Discard Pile except rulings and shuffle them into Tour Deck.

RECORD.name: Revolution
RECORD.description: Play on a random, independent system with {POP}.

RECORD.name: Salvo
RECORD.description: You may use 2 {ACTION_BATTLE_STANDARD} and/or {ACTION_BATTLE_SPECIAL} weapons to be fired together at the same defender.
RECORD.evtdescription1: You may use 2 {ACTION_BATTLE_STANDARD} and/or {ACTION_BATTLE_SPECIAL} weapons to be fired together at the same defender.

RECORD.name: Scientific Insight
RECORD.description: Play on a random player ship.

RECORD.name: Scramble
RECORD.description: Move every non-player ship to a random system.

RECORD.name: Scramble II
RECORD.description: Switch 2 random systems, but leave their visitors in their location in the switched system.

RECORD.name: Search Light
RECORD.description: Search the Tour Deck for a card and place it in your hand as if you were drawing a card.

RECORD.name: Second Chance
RECORD.description: You may redo a random action.

RECORD.name: Secret Agent
RECORD.description: Play on a random {RSRC_RELATIONSHIP_INDEPENDENT} system with {POP}.
RECORD.evtdescription1: DD. 0-3: Agent is caught; discard this card and mark with {RSRC_RELATIONSHIP_ENEMY}.

RECORD.name: Sensor Glitch
RECORD.description: Play on a random player ship

RECORD.name: Shield Support
RECORD.description: Play during a combat round.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Owner takes no damage from any weapon.

RECORD.name: Shove
RECORD.description: Move a ship up to 2 systems over from its current location.

RECORD.name: Silver Tongue
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: Small World
RECORD.description: Play a random, non-player ship from the Tour Deck.

RECORD.name: Solar Storm
RECORD.description: Move a random, player ship one system over in a any direction.

RECORD.name: Speed
RECORD.description: Move a player ship up to 2 systems from its current location. This does not count as a regular move.

RECORD.name: Star Map
RECORD.description: Chart all systems in sector.

RECORD.name: Stealing
RECORD.description: Search Tour Deck for a resource card with {RSRC_CARGO} and play on a player ship in a system with {POP}. Mark system with {RSRC_RELATIONSHIP_ENEMY}. Player must have {RSRC_PIRATE}.

RECORD.name: Stealing ||
RECORD.description: Search Tour Deck for 2 resource cards with {RSRC_CARGO} and play on a player ship in a system with {POP}. Mark system with {RSRC_RELATIONSHIP_ENEMY}. Player must have {RSRC_PIRATE}.

RECORD.name: Suicide Run
RECORD.description: Play during a combat round.

RECORD.name: Tag
RECORD.description: Play on a NPC that has {TECH} in the same location as a player ship.

RECORD.name: Terran Treaty
RECORD.description: Play on Rulings.

RECORD.name: Theed Treaty
RECORD.description: Play on Rulings.

RECORD.name: Time Flies
RECORD.description: Discard a card from your hand and draw 3 cards from top of Tour Deck.

RECORD.name: Uninstall
RECORD.description: Discard a resource card attached to a random player ship that has {RSRC_UPGRADE}.

RECORD.name: Unplanned
RECORD.description: Play on a random player ship.

RECORD.name: Unusual Trait
RECORD.description: Play on a player ship.

RECORD.name: War Cry
RECORD.description: Randomly select a non-aligned alignment for war with you. Mark characters with selected alignment with ENEMY.

RECORD.name: Weapons Offline
RECORD.description: Play on a random player ship.

RECORD.name: Wild Fire
RECORD.description: For every system with {RSRC_SYSTEM_BADLAND} that does not have a {RSRC_SATELLITE}, destroy a random system.

RECORD.name: X-Shields
RECORD.description: Play during a combat round.
RECORD.evtdescription1: Owner takes no damage from any weapon.

RECORD.name: Probe III
RECORD.evtdescription2: TAC{GT}15 DD. 0-2: Destroy opponent. 3-6: DMG=20 and move defender to random system if ship.

RECORD.name: Rylan Hunter
RECORD.evtdescription2: TAC{GT}20: All non-Rylan ships are moved to random systems. If location is Non-Rylan, do 20 DAMAGE to system.

RECORD.name: Bartok Nova
RECORD.evtdescription1: If visitor TAC{LT}15, mark with 5 DAMAGE.

RECORD.name: Calladon
RECORD.evtdescription1: Score resource cards with {RSRC_CARGO} or {RSRC_PASSENGER} from ship.

RECORD.name: Charon Nebulae
RECORD.evtdescription1: Subtract 5 from DD for every shot fired.

RECORD.name: Cheby Nova
RECORD.evtdescription1: Visitor TAC{LT}15: Do 10 Damage to visitor.

RECORD.name: Corton 2
RECORD.evtdescription1: Trade 1 card in your hand for the top card of the Tour Deck. Shuffle Tour Deck.

RECORD.name: Cronos Fold
RECORD.evtdescription1: DD. 0-3: Discard top 2 cards from the Tour Deck.

RECORD.name: Ehchno Fountain
RECORD.evtdescription1: Move ship up to 2 systems away.

RECORD.name: Kasmak Rift
RECORD.evtdescription1: DD. 0-4: Character cannot leave this turn.

RECORD.name: Klowdee Nebulae
RECORD.evtdescription1: Cannot taget a character in system.

RECORD.name: Los Ka 8
RECORD.evtdescription1: DD. 7-9: Draw 1 card from your Tour Deck. 0-4: Randomly discard a card from your Points Pile.

RECORD.name: Medusa Nullspace
RECORD.evtdescription1: No cards may be played this phase.

RECORD.name: Nosee Nebulae
RECORD.evtdescription1: Cannot taget a character in this system.
RECORD.evtdescription2: Cannot taget a character in this system.

RECORD.name: Pratan
RECORD.evtdescription1: Discard a card in your hand for the top card of the Tour Deck..

RECORD.name: Sodah Fountain
RECORD.evtdescription1: Move ship up to 2 systems away.

RECORD.name: Xex
RECORD.evtdescription1: Score any cards with {RSRC_CARGO} or {RSRC_PASSENGER} from ship.
